19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: Abdur-Rahman bin 'Abbas said:"I heard 'Abbas when a man said to him: 'Did you go out (to the Eid prayer) with the Messenger of Allah?' He said: 'Yes, and were it not for my kinship (position) with him I would not have done so'"-meaning due to him being so young- "He (the Prophet (ﷺ)) went to the mark near the house of Kathir bin As-Salt and prayed, then delivered a Khutbah. Then he went to the women. He exhorted them and reminded them and told them to give charity. So a woman would bring her hand near her neck and take off her necklace and put it in the garment of Bilal

chapter.ara-name: باب مَوْعِظَةِ الإِمَامِ النِّسَاءَ بَعْدَ الْفَرَاغِ مِنَ الْخُطْبَةِ وَحَثِّهِنَّ عَلَى الصَّدَقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam exhorting the women after finishing his Khutbah and encouraging them to give charity
